predicate.note: Frames file for 'proceed' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 55.1, other framed members include begin and resume. Comparison with 'continue'.

example.name: transitive agentive
example.text: He called today's announcement ``opportunistic and disruptive'' and said the company intends *trace* to proceed with its restructuring.

example.name: ergative
example.text: He said it has reached the same conclusions about some attempts to buy closely held concerns, but eventually allowed those acquisitions to proceed.
